Name: lanname
column6: name of the language (to be specified when creating a function)

Name: lanispl
column6: this is false for internal languages (such as sql) and true for dynamically loaded language handler modules. it essentially means that, if it is true, the language may be dropped.

Name: lanpltrusted
column6: this is a trusted language. see under create language what this means. if this is an internal language (lanispl is false) then this field is meaningless.

Name: lanplcallfoid
column6: for non-internal languages this references the language handler, which is a special function that is responsible for executing all functions that are written in the particular language.
